meanings: (화학작용) [명사] decomposition, [동사] decompose, break down, resolve (sth into sth), be degraded

vlive.korean: 분해. I was mad. 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : 오랜만에승희다_!
어차피 분해되면 다 똑같이 당 아닌가요? Won't it all break down into sugar particles? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 스윗한 태현이의 스윗한거 만들기
vlive.english: Won't it all break down into sugar particles?

vlive.korean: 아무도 안 왔으면 우리 팀 약간 분해될 뻔했네? If no one came, our team might have split? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.141 I.M 'HORIZON' MV
vlive.english: If no one came, our team might have split?

vlive.korean: 갑자기 분해기 싸해졌어요? Someone killed the mood? 듣기 View video KKOSISTERS : 사람이 인형이 되는 아트 메이크업(Ball-jointed Doll Art makeup)

vlive.english: Who would like to go next? Hyunsik?

examples.korean: As the waste materials decompose, they produce methane gas. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 폐기물들이 분해되면서 메탄가스를 방출한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
